altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY R

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED: Astray R

description.en: Junk dealer Lowe Guele travels the universe with the Gundam Astray Red Frame he finds in the destroyed colony of Heliopolis!

title.en: Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together 4-koma Kings

altTitles.ja: タクティクスオウガ Let Us Cling Together 4コマKINGS

description.en:
A 4-koma anthology of the game Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together. 
Published in 1999.

altTitles.ja: だれでも抱けるキミが好き

altTitles.vi: Crush Của Tôi Là Một Đứa Lẳng Lơ

altTitles.en: I Like You Who Can Have Sex With Anyone
I like you who can have sex anyone.

altTitles.es-la: Me Gustas tú, que Puedes tener Sexo con Cualquiera

altTitles.vi: Crush 𧵑晬羅殁矴朗曥 (Nom Script)

altTitles.pt-br: Eu goste de você, que pode fazer sexo com qualquer um

description.en:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Comic Days](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437), [Magazine Pocket](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

description.en:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

title.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Taster

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Villain's Poison Detector
I Will Become a Poison Detector in the Dark World
I Will Become a Poison Detector of Darkness

altTitles.zh: 完蛋！成了反派的试毒小跟班

description.en:
I, an innocent office worker, possessed a character in the devastating novel *The Poisoned Apple*. On top of that, I'm Giselle Lloydsvin, a villainess who gets poisoned to death before being hanged! But the poison brought by the assassins doesn't work? It even tastes like fruit!

"You'll be okay since it's only a little bit, so hurry and drink it."

…Even though I possessed someone, it seems my destiny is to be tormented by a crazy assassin. 

However, "Leniel", who I thought was just a crazy assassin, turns out to be the frontman for the final villain, "Wayne Ayore"?!

In order to hold onto this lifeline, I clung to the villain in *The Poisoned Apple*. 

"I can distinguish the taste of poison."

“Poison?”

“Yes.”

“What use is that?”

“Your boss is going to be poisoned, so I can be his poison taster.”

And so, I thought I could survive well as a general store employee of the villain’s frontman(?)... 

“My boss is so strong to the point that there’s something suspicious about him!”

…Why does it feel like I’m doomed in this life too?

altTitles.ja: ストロベリーパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
Cover: Hanekoto  
Illustration: Yuama

altTitles.ja: 重甲ビーファイター
ビーファイターカブト

description.en: Based on the TV Series of the same name, insects all over the world begin to swarm for unknown reasons, with other animals and plants acting strange as well. To investigate this, Takuya Kai is dispatched with an Earth Academia group. Investigating independently, Takuya finds Guru who reveals that insects are preparing for battle against invaders from another dimension. Offering their aid, the Earth Academia create suits of armor to combat the threat as the Jamahl arrive to Earth to enslave humans. Though they have trouble perfecting the Bio-Machinery, Guru arrives to infuse the armor with the life force of many insects. Once the suits become the B-Commanders, one suit chooses Takuya while the other two bond to Daisaku Katagiri and Rei Hayama. With their newfound power, the B-Fighters fight to drive back Jamahl's forces.

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa” has made three best friends in her online game, and she’s excited to meet them in real life at a dessert café for the first time. The only problem: She’s actually a man who’s been lying to them. What begins as a tense manga about online life quickly turns into a lighthearted comedy about friendship, gender, and forgiving yourself and others. [Kodansha]

After saving a small village from troublesome bandits, three young adventurers decide to partake in the notorious Walesena Military Trials, a decision that sparked a journey none of the three could ever dream of.

Join them on the epic tale through the vast and fantastical world called Walesena.

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

description.en: Horny boss and underpaid salary man.

altTitles.ja-ro: Eris no Seihai: Konyaku Haki Sareta Reijou wa, Kidai no Akujo ni Tasukerareta Daisho Toshite Fukushuu ni Tsuki Awasaremasu

altTitles.ja: エリスの聖杯 ～婚約破棄された令嬢は、稀代の悪女に助けられた代償として復讐に付き合わされます～

description.en:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

altTitles.ja: ガンニバル

description.en: When a police officer is posted to a remote village in the countryside, little does he realize he's encroaching on a community of cannibals…
description.ru:
Полицейский Дайго Агава вместе с семьёй переезжает в горную деревушку под названием Цветочная. Жители деревни горячо принимают семью Дайго.
Однажды в лесу находят труп старушки. После этого происшествия Дайго постепенно начинает осознавать все происходящие вокруг странности и приходит к мысли, что в этой деревне едят людей. Начинают происходить очень странные инциденты, атмосфера отчуждения наполняет деревню. Сможет ли обычный полицейский разгадать все ужасные тайны, которая таит в себе эта деревня и, что важнее, сможет ли он остаться в живых?

title.en: NEET ni Natteita Hatsukoi no Hito wo Shiawase ni Suru made

altTitles.ja: ニートになっていた初恋の人を幸せにするまで

altTitles.en: Until I Make My First Love-Turned-NEET Happy

description.en: Ten years ago he moved away from his first love. Now working in Tokyo, he's excited to find that she's living next door. But instead of the confident girl he left behind, now all that remains is a chubby NEET. Can he bring her happiness?

altTitles.ja: ふしぎなメルモ

altTitles.vi: Merumo và Những viên kẹo thần kì

description.en:
A fantasy story for kids featuring a girl named Melmo, who can change her age as she wishes by eating special candies.  
  
Melmo's mother dies in a traffic accident, leaving young Melmo and her younger brother Totoo. Anxious, Melmo's mother in heaven asks God to prepare some magical candies, and hands them to Melmo.  
There are two kinds: Melmo can grow 10 years older to become any sort of adult she wishes by eating a blue candy. By eating a red one, she can become 10 years younger.  
  
Using these miracle candies, Melmo disguises herself as a nurse, schoolteacher, policewoman, and overcomes troubles together with her brother, Totoo.

---
**Volume 280 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

altTitles.en: The Personal Circumstances of the Twins.

altTitles.ja: 双子たちの諸事情

description.en:
Kouki and Nao are siblings that harbor feelings for each other that they're not allowed to express since they're 'twins'.  
"I locked away the key gently in my heart but mom reveals a secret about Kouki!"  
"The person I like is my twin!" Pure 120% romcom, start!
description.pt-br: Kouki e Nao são irmãos gêmeos que nutrem sentimentos um pelo outro, apesar de não conseguirem expressar esses sentimentos devido ao fato de crescerem como irmãos gêmeos. Entretanto, sua mãe revela um segredo sobre Kouki.

title.en: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ja: 陰キャだった俺の青春リベンジ 天使すぎるあの娘と歩むReライフ

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ru: Месть моей юности: Моя жизнь с девушкой, которая была слишком похожа на ангела

altTitles.en: The Revenge of My Youth: My Re Life with a Girl Who Was Too Much of an Angel

altTitles.ja: 陰リベ

description.en:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life …… was gray and shady, but he’s sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

“I feel like you’ve changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You’re still kind, but you’ve grown up, and that’s wonderful!”

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that I’ve acquired, I’m going to take my revenge on my second youth with her–!
description.id: bercerita tentang seorang budak korporat bernama Niihama Shincirou yang bekerja di perusahaan gelap dia pingsan setelah kelelahan bekerja dan ketika terbangun ia terkejut karena ternyata dia mengalami lompatan waktu dan kembali ke masa di mana dia masih seorang murid SMA. lalu karena dia sudah kembali ke masa lalu dia bertekad untuk balas dendam dengan menjadi lebih aktif dan berjuang untuk mendapatkan hal yang dia inginkan tidak peduli siapapun lawannya sampai pada akhirnya menebus semua penyesalan yang telah ia lakukan di kehidupan sebelumnya...
description.ja:
ブラック企業勤めの社畜サラリーマン・新浜心一郎は、過労の末に職場で倒れ――――目が覚めると高校時代に！？
タイムリープ青春"リベンジ"ラブコメ、ここに開幕！
description.pt-br:
Niihama Shinichirou, o qual desmaiou após ser explorado ao extremo por uma ‘companhia exploradora’ e ao acordar descobriu que havia sido mandado de volta para o segundo ano do ensino médio. Sua vida escolar foi sombria e melancólica… No entanto, ele tem certeza de que agora pode recomeçar.
Haruka Shijouin, uma linda garota que ele conheceu antes, de repente parece ainda mais inocente e bonita do que Shinichirou se lembrava, e acima de tudo, ela olha diretamente para ele… 

“Eu sinto que você está bem diferente do Niihama que eu conhecia ontem. Você continua gentil, mas você cresceu, e isso é maravilhoso!” 

Se eu pudesse mudar o futuro, eu definitivamente iria salvá-la depois que ela tirou a própria vida após sofrer severamente por conta de bullying. Com a mentalidade adulta e poderes corporativos que adquiri, eu vou me vingar da minha segunda juventude com ela–!

title.en: Class no Bocchi Gal wo Omochikaeri Shite Seisokei Bijin ni Shite Yatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: クラスのぼっちギャルをお持ち帰りして清楚系美人にしてやった話

altTitles.en: A Story Of Taking Home A Lonely Gal From My Class And Turning Her Into An Elegant Beauty

altTitles.zh: 收留孤身一人的同班辣妹，并使之化身清纯美女

altTitles.zh-ro: Shōuliú gūshēn yīrén de tóngbān làmèi, bìng shǐ zhī huàshēn qīngchún měinǚ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no Bocchi Gyaru o Omochikaeri shite Seisokei Bijin ni shiteyatta Hanashi

description.en: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. “…I don’t have a home anymore.” Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn’t leave a girl alone, so he took her home. “Thanks for the help.” “I-It’s fine…” When Akira heard about Aoi’s complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
description.ja:
来年転校を控えている高校生の明護晃はある雨の日、近所の公園でずぶ濡れになっている金髪ギャルのクラスメイト、五月女葵を見かける。

「……私、帰る家がないの」

どう見てもワケアリの葵を放っておけず、自宅に連れ帰るのだが――

「お風呂、ありがとう」
「お、おう……」

葵の抱える複雑な事情を聞いた晃は人助けだと思い、転校までの間、そのまま一緒に生活をすることに。はじめて尽くしの同居生活に戸惑いながらも、二人はゆっくりと心の距離を近づけていき――。これは、出会いと別れを繰り返す二人の恋物語（ラブストーリー）。
description.pt-br: Uma vez ele ajudou uma garota da sua sala. Em uma tarde chuvosa, Akira Akamori, um colegial que acabou de mudar para uma nova escola, viu sua colega de sala loira, encharcada pela chuva em uma praça por perto. “… eu não tenho mais aonde morar.” Apesar da Aoi ser uma completa estranha para ele, ele não pode deixar a garota sozinha, então a levou para sua casa. “Obrigada pela ajuda.” “E-está tudo bem…”

description.en: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

title.en: Kakawatte wa Ikenai Type no Musume ga Kanojo ni Natta

altTitles.ja: 関わってはいけないタイプの娘が彼女になった

altTitles.en: Dating the Kind of Girl You Shouldn't Get Involved With

altTitles.es-la: Una mujer peligrosa se convirtió en mi novia

altTitles.pt-br: Um tipo perigoso de garota se tornou minha namorada

altTitles.zh-hk: 不該扯上關係的女生成了我女友

altTitles.en: A Dangerous Type Became My Girlfriend

altTitles.ja-ro: Kakawatte wa Ikenai Taipu no Musume ga Kanojo ni Natta

description.en: Having been through many bad relationships with guys constantly trying to take advantage of her, Enokawa Miyu is determined to take her revenge from here on in: She hook up with guys, milk them for all they're worth, and dump them then move on to her next prey. Yuuki-kun, her latest target, seems to just be your typical nice guy that genuinely looks out for Miyu, completely oblivious of her intentions. However, something's different about him that makes Miyu unable to carry on her usual scheme...
description.ja:
地雷系女子の、２つの顔――。

美遊は男ウケする可愛いビジュアルをしていながらも、心の中では男を一切信じず、あざとく、したたかに生きていた。しかし、優希くんに出会ってからは調子が狂いっぱなしで……。真心男子×地雷系女子の「駆け引きゼロ」の恋が始まる。
description.pt-br: Em algum lugar ao longo do caminho eu realmente me apaixonei...

altTitles.zh-ro: Gong Jue Jia De Du Zhi Hua
Gōng Jué Jiā De Dú Zhī Huā

altTitles.en: The Poisonous Flower of the Duke's House

description.en:
Lily Roland, the daughter of Duke Roland, stumbled upon her fiancé and her illegitimate sister having an affair! She was poisoned by the two people whom she grew up with, and thrown into the wilderness.

When her life was hanging by a thread, she was saved by a monstrous creature that had a body of a human, but a head of a beast, who turned out to be the Crown Prince, Isaac Stewart.

Isaac was cursed by a mysterious witch to turn into a bloodthirsty monster on the night when the moon is full, and Lily’s blood is his only antidote!

Isaac decides to help Lily in her revenge, but in exchange, she must marry him and assist him in lifting the curse.

altTitles.ja: ごちうさ
ご注文はうさぎですか？

altTitles.zh: 请问您今天要来点兔子吗

description.en: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

title.en: Ashita, Watashi wa Dareka no Kanojo

altTitles.en: Tomorrow, I Will Be Someone's Girlfriend

altTitles.zh-hk: 明天，我會成為誰的女友

altTitles.ja: 明日、私は誰かのカノジョ

altTitles.ja-ro: Ashita, Watashi wa Dareka no Kanojo

altTitles.es-la: Algún Día Seré la Novia de Alguien.

altTitles.vi: Ngày mai, tôi sẽ là bạn gái của ai?

description.en: A bitter love story depicting the realities of love between female college students who earn money by renting themselves out to men as their girlfriends.
description.ja:
「一週間に一回、私は【誰か】の彼女になる」　

彼女代行として日々お金を稼ぐ女子大生と彼女に魅せられた男達の、恋愛のリアルを描くビターラブストーリー。

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.ja: はじめてのギャル

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected. A series of "firsts" begins!
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

description.en:
On the day Yun Li decided to give up on pursuing Fu Shize, she wiped off every possible trace of his contact information with teary eyes. A long time after they got together, Yun Li wasn't good at communication and was debating if she should block a guy friend who had expressed interest for her. Fu Shize leaned against the couch and stared at her with droopy eyes. He let out a chuckle before saying in a cold tone, "You're a piece of work."

Yun Li lifted her head. "?"

"Back then, you blocked me without hesitation."

"..."
description.zh: *轻度社恐（为爱做E版）x白月光（陨落版） *女追男 放弃追傅识则的那天，云厘红着眼睛，删掉了关于他的所有联系方式。 再后来，两人在一起后的某天。 云厘不擅长与人打交道，纠结了好一阵要不要删掉一个突然对她表露出暧昧倾向的男性朋友。 旁边的傅识则靠在沙发上，懒懒地看着她，突然笑了声，语气没什么温度：“可以。” 云厘抬头：“？” “删我微信就这么干脆。” “……”

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.vi: Rockman - Chiến binh thế giới ảo

altTitles.ja: ロックマンエグゼ

description.en: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."

title.en: The Story of a Scary Consignee

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en:
Lee Kyun, the Shepherd, is at the top of the pyramid of the Carnivore Class. Everything was perfect - other than the fact that he has a crush on his best friend, Choi Hae Beom, the Leopard. Too scared to confess, he thought he would be satisfied with just the title of "Best Friend," when a bottom-of-the-food-chain, zero-attack-power Golden Hamster appears and starts to show interest in Hae Beom. Between the two of them, who will manage to capture the Leopard's heart?!

#BL #ShortSeries #Cute #Sweet #SchoolSetting #Hybrids #UnrequitedLove #LoveTriangle #NiceTop #CuteBottom

title.en: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai

altTitles.en: Only I Am Not Attacked in a World Overflowing With Zombies

altTitles.ja: ゾンビのあふれた世界で俺だけが襲われない

altTitles.en: In A World Filled With Zombies, I’m The Only One They Won’t Attack

altTitles.pt-br: Em um Mundo Cheio de Zumbis, Eu Sou o Único que Eles Não Vão Atacar

altTitles.id: Didunia yang penuh dengan Zombie hanya aku yang tidak diserang

altTitles.zh-hk: 在遍地都是喪屍的世界裡唯獨我不被襲擊

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje

altTitles.ja: 天空侵犯arrive
天空侵犯アライヴ

description.en: Senya is just an ordinary boy, who wanted to become an astronaut as a kid. One day and suddenly, he's transported into another world after seeing on the rooftop of his school something like a "tower" going across the sky. There, he witnesses a ruined world, where skyscrapers are connected by suspension bridges. Senya, perplexed, manages to see a girl standing on the roof of another building, as well as a masked man holding a bloody weapon in his hands…

Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

title.en: Sacchan to Ken-chan wa Kyou mo Itteru

altTitles.en: Sacchan and Ken-chan Are Going at it Again

altTitles.ja: さっちゃんとけんちゃんは今日もイってる

description.en: University student Kenta is excited to be going out with the quiet but beautiful Sachiko. Six months into their relationship, a side of Sachiko other than her "ladylike" side becomes apparent. The more you know about her, the more you fall in love with her.
description.ja: 物静かな美人・幸子と付き合うことになり、舞い上がる男子大学生・賢太。 付き合って半年後、明らかになる”おしとやか”だけじゃない彼女の一面に!? 知れば知るほど好きになる、イケメン彼女と乙女な彼氏のイってる系エロコメディ開幕!!

altTitles.ja: 異種族レビュアーズ

description.en:
In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste. 

Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, and show us that the fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.
description.ru: Действие манги происходит в вымышленном мире, населённом различными расами разумных существ, в котором существует процветающий рынок интимных услуг. Благодаря такому высокому развитию секс-индустрии в мире появились профессиональные критики, специализирующиеся исключительно на оценке качества проституток. Одними из них являются человек Станк и эльф Зел, путешествующие из города в город для оценки каждого местного квартала красных фонарей, после чего посылают свои обзоры для составления сводного рейтинга борделей. Объединившись с ангелом по имени Крим, критики собирают информацию о сексуальных достоинствах всех видов живых существ этого мира, получая удовольствие от процесса и зарабатывая попутно дополнительные деньги.
description.es-la: En nuestro mundo, la raza humana debate constantemente sobre varios temas importantes, como por ejemplo: ¿Cual chica es la mejor? ¿Y qué tan buena es como material de masturbación? ¿Qué fetiche es el más sexy? Acompaña a estos grandes guerreros, que se presentan con diferentes chicas, diferentes opiniones, diferentes erecciones, y que nos muestran que un mundo de fantasía puede no ser tan diferente al nuestro.
description.pt-br: Em nosso mundo, a raça humana debate constantemente várias questões importantes, como: qual é a melhor garota? Quão bom é um material para se masturbar? Qual fetiche é o mais sexy?... Acompanhe esses grandes guerreiros enquanto eles nos apresentam garotas diferentes, opiniões diferentes, tesões diferentes e nos mostram que o mundo da fantasia pode não ser tão diferente do nosso.

title.en: Teihen Ossan, Cheat Kokusei de Isekai Rakuraku Life

altTitles.en: Bottom-Tier Old Man, Living the Easy Life in Another World with Cheat Powers

altTitles.ja: 底辺おっさん、チート覚醒で異世界楽々ライフ

description.en: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world… This is the record of a man’s meteoric rise from the depths to cheat-level life in another world!

Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs, but joins the Royal Guard of Futura. Through many harsh battles and emotional moments, he will persist to make Futura into a better nation!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)


♥ Animated Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf
♥ Support: on patreon, if I open it again!

altTitles.ja: (C94) [あたまお花畑 (尾玉)] 再び星を知る (Fate/stay night)

altTitles.ja-ro: (C94) [Atama Ohanabatake (Otama Ryouichi)] Futatabi Hoshi o Shiru (Fate/stay night)

altTitles.ja: 高嶺と花
타카네와 하나

description.en: When Hana replaces her sister at an omiai (like a goukon, but for marriage) little does she expect to be insulted and called a gold digger by the handsome and older Takane! Furious, she throws her wig in his face and leaves. Unexpectedly she gets asked out on a date by Takane the next day. How will these two ever find love?
description.pl: Kiedy Hana zastąpiła swoją siostrę na spotkaniu aranżującym małżeństwo, nie przypuszczała, że zostanie nazwana deską i całkiem zwyczajną dziewczyną przez przystojnego i starszego Takane! W złości rzuca w niego swoją perukę. Następnego dnia zostaje niespodziewanie zaproszona na randkę przez Takane. Czy ta dwójka kiedykolwiek znajdzie miłość?

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: 名作落語全集

description.en: Rakugo: A traditional form of Japanese storytelling, told orally by one sitting down. Often humorous, often filled with folly, rakugo has persisted throughout the ages with good reason. Within *Masterpiece Rakugo Complete Works*, 33 rakugo stories are closely adapted by George Akiyama, who gives them his own charming, chaotic touch.

altTitles.ja: 女騎士ゴブリン

description.en: A Female Knight unexpectedly swaps bodies with the Goblin getting ready to assault her. How will they both deal with this sudden gender and species change?

title.en: Duel Masters LOST: Crystal of Remembrance

altTitles.ja: Duel Masters LOST ～追憶の水晶～

description.en: A new “Duel Masters” story begins! Kirifuda Win, who has lost all memories of his past, is now living alone in Tokyo. In the midst of his ordinary daily life, the footsteps of the world’s end gradually begin to draw near. The secret of Win’s hidden past is…?

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.en: I Want To See You Blush

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: 君が獣になる前に

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ga Kemono ni Naru Mae ni

description.en: Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker, but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country, Kidō Kotone, a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths, but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.

First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.

title.en: She Changed So Much in One Year

altTitles.ja: １年で変わってしまった彼女

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichi nen de Kawatte Shimatta Kanojo

description.en: Skylar has a secret hobby - taking photos of his crush, Chan-il. But when Cirrus stumbles upon Skylar's cloud storage with its impressive collection of Chan-il's photos, things escalate pretty quickly. At first confident his secret is safe with Cirrus, Skylar continuously finds himself in compromising situations, making him question Cirrus' true motives
description.uk:
У Ханиля є таємне хобі - фотографувати своє нерозділене кохання, Чаниля. Але коли Хьонун натикається на хмарне сховище Ханиля, з його вражаючою колекцією фотографій, ситуація досить швидко загострюється.
Чи збереже Хьонун секрет? Що він задумав?
description.pt-br: Skylar tem um hobby secreto - tirar fotos de sua paixão, Chan-il. Mas quando Cirrus se depara com o armazenamento de nuvem de Skylar com sua impressionante coleção de fotos de Chan-il, as coisas começam a andar muito rapidamente. A princípio confiante de que seu segredo está seguro com Cirrus, Skylar continuamente se encontra em situações comprometedoras, fazendo-o questionar os verdadeiros motivos de Cirrus.
